entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump Trump has been using the WH for personal gain. Providing no oversight of his use of the $2T would be insane.

Also, as we brace for the worst of this crisis remember that the reach of the #Coronavirus is attributable to his "colossal failure of leadership” https://t.co/B7LcGoQRkq
